prompt: What are the details of all users?
What is the status of all GenieJobs?
Which GenieJob execution resulted in errors?
List all manual activities and their maximum activity time.
What are the RPA User Groups and their associated users?
Which users belong to the 'Gold Star' project?
ms_sql: SELECT EpiUsers.FirstName, EpiUsers.LastName FROM EpiUsers INNER JOIN EpiProjectUser ON EpiUsers.Id = EpiProjectUser.EpiUserId INNER JOIN EpiProjects ON EpiProjectUser.ProjectId = EpiProjects.ProjectId WHERE EpiProjects.Name = 'Gold Star';

prompt: List all applications marked as browsers.
What are the details of all Capture Jobs?
Which users have login issues recorded in the audit trail?
ms_sql: SELECT UserName, Action, BrowserInfo FROM EpiAuditTrail WHERE Action = 'Login Failed';
